knimeNode.name: Target Shuffling
knimeNode.shortDescription: Randomly shuffles the values in one column

fullDescription.intro: This node performs y-scrambling by randomly permutating the values in one column of the input table. This can be used to check if learned models make sense: if the y-values are scrambled the prediction performance should degrade drastically.
fullDescription.option: Name of the column to shuffle

Enter a seed for the random number generator. Entering a seed will cause the node to shuffle the same input data always the same way (e.g. if you reset and execute the node). Disable this option to have always a different seed, i.e. real randomness.

ports.outPort: Datatable with values shuffled in one column
